overview:
Dr. McArthur is a Biotechnologist with a track record in the successful creation of novel and powerful technology platforms.

While he was Director of Molecular Biology at Regulome Corporation which developed a multi-faceted platform capable of functionally annotating the human genome.

Since returning to the UK he has established a variety of proprietary techniques, which are at the core of Procarta Biosystems, to manipulate bacterial gene expression and adapted the approach to tackle the drug-resistant pathogenic bacteria prevalent in our clinics.
